name: Jerry
line: Steve, I just got a weird e-mail. Did you buy us airline tickets?

name: Uncle Steve
line: Aw shoot, it was supposed to be a surprise! I wanted to thank you for letting me live here all this time, so I'm treating the family to a vacation!

name: Beth
line: Steve, you're so sweet!

name: Morty
line: Thanks Uncle Steve!

name: Summer
line: Best uncle ever!

name: Uncle Steve
line: Look out world, the Smith family is goin' to Paris!

name: Summer
line: Yeah! Awesome!

name: Jerry
line: Rick, I don't like glowing rocks in the kitchen trash.

name: Rick
line: Well, I don't like your unemployed genes in my grandchildren, Jerry. But life is made of little concessions.

name: Jerry
line: I, you know what, I-

name: Uncle Steve
line: You're gonna land on your feet Jer. Some company out there's gonna thank they're lucky stars they hired my little brother.

name: Rick
line: Who the fuck are you?

name: Jerry
line: My goofy brother Steve. He's been living here almost a year now, are you losing your mind?

name: Uncle Steve
line: Hey someone's been spending too much time around glowing rocks am I right?

name: Morty
line: What the hell, Rick? What the hell?

name: Rick
line: Everybody just relax for a second. There's no such thing as an "Uncle Steve." That is an alien parasite.

name: Jerry
line: But I've known him my whole life!

name: Rick
line: No, you haven't Jerry. These telepathic little bastards, they embed themselves in memories they use those to multiply, spread out, and take over planets. It's disgusting.

name: Morty
line: Steve wasn't real?

name: Rick
line: He's a real piece of shit! This is a big one, someone probably tracked in last week on the bottom of their shoe or on a piece of alien fruit.

name: Summer
line: Someone?

name: Rick
line: Get off the high road, Summer. We all got pink eye because you won't stop texting on the toilet.

name: Morty
line: But Uncle Steve taught me how to ride a bike.

name: Rick
line: No, "Steve" put that memory in your brain so he could live in your house, eat your food, and multiply. We could be infested with these things, so we gotta keep an eye out for any zany, wacky characters that pop up.

name: Mr. Poopybutthole
line: Ooh wee, whatever you want Rick! We're here to help!

name: Rick
line: Thanks Mr. Poopybutthole. I always could count on you.

name: Rick
line: Alright, there's six of us and that's it. Me, Morty, Jerry, Beth, Mr. Poopybutthole, and Summer.

name: Mr. Poopybutthole
line: Maybe you got the first one in time Rick!

name: Rick
line: Can't afford to chance it.

name: Beth
line: Dad, why does our house have blast shields?

name: Rick
line: Trust me, Beth, you don't wanna know how many answers that question has.

name: Poopybutthole
line: Ooh, gosh, it feelsclaustrophobic! Reminds me of that time we all got stuck in the elevatortogether. Y-- remember that? After the Hulk musical?

name: Beth
line: Jerry, buttons don't workbetter if you hit them harder, and foam fists don't make you strong.

name: Jerry
line: I know. Friends make youstrong. I watched the same musical you did.

name: Rick
line: Why couldn't I bring my portal gun?

name: Morty
line: Why did all the drinks have to be extra large? Oh, the Hulk. I just got that.

name: Summer
line: Just pee your pants. I did it the minute we got stuck.  Oh, oh, yeah, yeah, shame me. At least when I'mdisgusting, it's on purpose.

name: Mr. Poopybutthole
line: Oh, y'all, we're gonnabe fine. I've always been here for you guys, and I always will be.

name: Nicky
line: Somebody call for repairs?

name: All
line: Yay! Cousin Nicky!

name: Nicky
line: It's me, Cousin Nicky. I'm walkin' here! I mean, I'm not. I'm crouched in the elevatorshaft, but hey, I'm walkin' here!

name: Nicky
line: It's true. We really do get into some crazy situations as a family, mostly when we're cooped up like this. Hey, maybe Mr. Poopypants is right. L-let's get some fresh air.

name: Morty
line: Come on, cousin Nicky. Youheard Rick. We have to stay quarantined until we know that there's no more of these things.

name: Nicky
line: I hear you, Morty. Back inBrooklyn, we got a sayin' -- "we're walkin' here!"

name: Jerry
line: Nicky!

name: Nicky
line: Oh!

name: Morty
line: What the...? Cousin Nicky was a parasite?!

name: Rick
line: Six, Morty! There's supposed to be six of us! If there's seven, then that means somebody's not real.

name: Beth
line: But how did you know it was Nicky?

name: Rick
line: I guessed. That's why I aimed for his shoulder.

name: Beth
line: So we can't trust any of our memories now? Nicky was the reason we found that old nazi submarine. Did that not even happen?

name: Jerry
line: Well, of course it happened.

name: Nazi
line: Now that I possess the mighty staff of Rah-gubaba, the world will tremble before the Fourth Reich!

name: Morty
line: This is the last time I ask you for help on my history final, Rick.

name: Nicky
line: Hey, we got a word for Nazis back in Brooklyn, pal.

name: Nazi
line: I'm comfortable being called a Nazi. You think there's some other word that will hurt my feelings?  Yeah. Think before you talk shit. Rah-gubaba, help me kill America!

name: All
line: Mr. Beauregard!

name: Mr. Beauregard
line: After due consideration, I have elected not to retire.

name: All
line: Yeah! Oh, thank god!

name: Mr. Beauregard
line: Now, I believe someone has a final exam to attend. Set a course for Morty's high school.

name: Mr. Beauregard
line: Perhaps I'm biased, but if that story never happened, then I wouldn't still be the family butler.  dare to dream.

name: Rick
line: Wait.

name: Summer
line: And if Mr. Beauregard wasn't our butler, it's safe to say the family'd be in a hell of a lot of trouble.

name: Rick
line: No! Don't flashback!

name: Summer
line: You're just gonna make more swelling.

name: Beth
line: Don't worry, Jerry. Just relax. We called the fire department.

name: Jerry
line: You know they won't come here anymore.

name: Mr. Beauregard
line: Marmalade is served.

name: Frankenstein
line: I guess I take back what I said about British cuisine.

name: Rick
line: Take that!

name: Sleepy Gary
line: We're trying to sleep.

name: Morty
line: I don't want to go to the dance alone.

name: Mr. Beauregard
line: Then perhaps, you shouldn't.

name: Beth
line: Aww. Mr. Beauregard.

name: Mr. Beauregard
line: Shall we, master Morty?

name: Morty
line: We shall.

name: Beth
line: Oh, wait, don't leave without letting Photography Raptor take a picture.

name: Rick
line: Everybody stop remembering! These parasites are like bed bugs, and every flashback is another mattress. Look! There's only supposed to be six people in this house.

name: Rick
line: No! Uh, the fact that I wrote this number down means that there's four parasites.

name: Frankenstein
line: You sure about that, Rick?

name: Mr. Beauregard
line: Begging your pardon, master Rick, but I seem to recall a great deal of confusion surrounding that number.

name: Rick
line: All right, there's six of us,  and that's it. Me, Morty, Jerry, Beth, Mr. Poopybutthole, Frankenstein, Sleepy Gary, Photography raptor, Mr. Beauregard, and Summer.

name: Beth
line: Uh, dad, that's like 10 people.

name: Rick
line: 6, 10, what's the difference? I just love the number 6 for no reason! Where's my pencil at?

name: Pencilvester
line: Right here, Rick! Use me!

name: Rick
line: Oh, thanks, Pencilvester!  Yeah,I-I g-- I guess that is what happened, but I-I don't get why I would do that.

name: Pencilvester
line: Everybody makes mistakes, Rick. Why do you think I have one of these?

name: Beth
line: That's it. Photos. Hard evidence.  You're not in any of my photos, Mr. Poopybutthole.

name: Mr. Poopybutthole
line: Well, what do you know about this? You're not in any of mine.

name: Summer
line: All I have are pictures of me and my friends from school.  What? What teenage girl has pictures of her family? It's not like we're Mormon or dying.

name: Frankenstein
line: I will admit it's suspicious that Summer's only friend is a magic ballerina lamb that we've never seen.

name: Tinkles
line: Summer!

name: Summer
line: Tinkles! It's past mybedtime.

name: Tinkles
line: Not in never past bedtime land! Here we go!

name: Summer
line: Ooh! Ooh! Ooh! Ooh! Ooh! Ooh! Ooh!

name: Gary
line: Summer, we're trying to sleep.

name: Summer
line: It was Tinkles! Tinkes?

name: Rick
line: That is su-- [belches] -- suspicious. We're always hearing about this Tinkles character, but we never get to â€“

name: Tinkles
line: Hi, everybody. I'm Tinkles, and these are my friends.

name: Summer
line: See, everyone? Tinkles is real. That means so am I.

name: Frankenstein
line: I was on the wrong side of the pitchfork on this one.

name: Jerry
line: Okay, look, we shouldn't need evidence or logic to know who's family and who isn't. I know who the Smiths are. I've known Beth since high school. And her husband, Sleepy Gary, is hands down my absolute best friend.

name: Sleepy Gary
line: Thanks, Jerry. Beyond that, no offense to any of you, but all bets are off.

name: Rick
line: Look, I'm not used to being this unsure for this long. I'm just gonna aim for shoulders starting with the weird girl.

name: Summer
line: Aah! Grandpa Rick!

name: Rick
line: Hold still, "Summer."

name: Gary
line: Rick, that is my daughter.

name: Rick
line: Oh, yeah? Well, what if you just think that, Sleepy Gary? I've known you for 15 years. Don't make me hurt you.

name: Sleepy Gary
line: Rick, these are our family and friends, the people we barbecue with. Have you forgotten the barbecue?

name: Rick
line: Wait, why would you want me to -- You're one of them, aren't you?

name: Hamurai
line: Rick, you love those barbecues, Rick. You love them. Hai!

name: Amish Cyborg
line: Remember it, Rick?

name: Rick
line: Shut up, Hamurai! Shut up, Amish Cyborg! What is this? '90s Conan?

name: All
line: Remember the barbecue. Remember the barbecue. Remember the barbecue.

name: Rick
line: You know what, Pencilvester? It took me my whole life to realize it, but I love barbecuing.

name: Pencilvester
line: You're good at it, Rick.

name: Rick
line: Watch me, baby. I'm like Tom Cruise from, um, "Cuisine" or w-whatever that movie's called where he makes drinks. Yeah, check me out. I'm like Tom Cruise from "Cuisine."  Yeah. Is that what it's called? "Cuisine"?

name: Pencilvester
line: Wow! Hey, everybody. Let's give it up for the grill master, Rick! Rick! Rick! Rick!

name: Rick
line: Wait.  Noooooo! Shoot. Now look. It's like a "Where's Waldo?" page. Can you find me? Check out all these zany characters. We'll be right back after these messages.

name: Sleepy Gary
line: I think you should put down the gun and we should get you to a doctor. What do you say we take down these blast shields?

name: All
line: Yeah.

name: Rick
line: Can't do that, Sleepy Gary. All right, everybody listen to me. I don't know if any of you guys are real, but this house has been infested with fake loved ones that spread through fake memories, and our planet will be destroyed if they get out.

name: Pencilvester
line: But Rick, even you have to admit you do tend to overreact to stuff.

name: Rick
line: You guys, we got to hurry. I just got back from Walmart. They're selling Nintendo 3ds systems for $149.99 on sale, plus every time you buy one, you get a $50 gift card. Brings the total price down to $110 after tax. Now, listen, we can flip those sons of bitches for 230 bucks apiece easy! They're all limited-edition "Zelda" ones. Hurry! Hurry! Come with me! We can be rich, and we also all get to keep one and we can play Nintendo games! Nintendo, give me free stuff.

name: Rick
line: Okay, yes, I definitely remember doing that, but also, I would never do that.

name: Pencilvester
line: Don't overreact, Rick.

name: Jerry
line: Sleepy Gary, a word?

name: Sleepy Gary
line: Sure, Jerry. Rick, keep a level head, okay? 'Cause I'll tell you a secret about Frankenstein -- He's actually Frankenstein's monster.

name: Jerry
line: Sleepy Gary, m-my head is filled with memories of our friendship. I'm convinced that you're Beth's husband and I'm your friend, but if those memories can't be trusted, then...

name: Sleepy Gary
line: Jerry, just say it.

name: Jerry
line: Sleepy Gary, how do we know I'm real?

name: Sleepy Gary
line: Jesus, Jerry. No, you're real. Hey, look at me. Now, I don't know which way is up out there, but I know us, and you're real, Jerry. Remember our vacation?

name: Gary
line: They're filming that new Star Wars movie down the coast. Should we check it out?

name: Jerry
line: Sure. Why not?

name: Gary
line: Maybe we'll see Chewbacca.

name: Jerry
line: I'd like that.

name: Jerry
line: What are we doing?

name: Gerry
line: I don't give a damn what else happens out there. You and I are going to survive this.

name: Jerry
line: Okay. Hey, we agreed. Never in the house.

name: Frankenstein
line: That's a cool watch there, Rick. Can I check it out?

name: Rick
line: Uh, no thank --  Okay. Trying tofigure out how to lower the blast shields, huh? Anybody here think it's suspicious that a lot of people in here can't wait to get out of here?

name: Frankenstein
line: Ah, you're paranoid, Rick. You've been paranoid since 'nam.

name: Rick
line: So, what are you gonnado when you rotate back to the world, Frankenstein?

name: Frankenstein
line: Shi-i-i-i-t. I'mma bust a --

name: Rick
line: No! Get out of my head, parasite! No! Drop it. Give me the gun, Frankenstein!  Give it back!

name: All
line: Yeah!  Frankenstein!

name: Rick
line: Is anyone here even real? Am I the only real person on earth?!

name: Reverse Giraffe
line: Maybe. Or maybe, just maybe, we're all real. You know me. I'm reverse giraffe. I have a short neck and legs. I went to college with Hamurai.

name: Hamurai
line: Hai!

name: Reverse Giraffe
line: I saved Ghost In A Jar's life in Vietnam.

name: Ghost in a Jar
line: Boo rah!

name: Reverse Giraffe
line: And Beth, how many times have I been a shoulder for you to cry on?

name: Beth
line: Too many.

name: Reverse Giraffe
line: Okay, so maybe we're just all fake.

name: Mrs. Refrigerator
line: That don't make no sense!

name: Reverse
line: Giraffe: Or maybe, there's only one deceiver here -- The person that keeps telling us the path to salvation is being held prisoner and mistrusting each other.

name: Rick
line: Hey, don't blame me! I tried to shoot Summer 10 minutes ago!

name: Reverse Giraffe
line: I know we all have beloved memories of Rick, but are we really supposed to believe that a mad scientist inventor with a flying car just showed up on our doorstep after being gone for years?

name: Morty
line: Yeah, you know, he does have a lot of really weird, made-up sounding catchphrases.

name: Rick
line: Wubba lubba dub dub! Ricky ticky tavi, beyotch! And that's thewa-a-a-a-y the news goes. Hit the sack, jack. Uh-oh! Somersault jump. Aids! Andthat's why I always say shum shum shlippedy dop! Grassss tastes bad-ah. No jumpin' in the sewer. Burger time! Rubber baby baby bunkers! Lick, lick, lick my balls!  yeah! Say that all the time.

name: All
line: That's a fake-ass catchphrase right there.

name: Beth
line: And don't forget his incredibly vague back story.

name: Rick
line: Beth, I'm your father!

name: Beth
line: Oh, are you, dad? Are you?

name: Morty
line: Rick, if you want to prove you're real, just do what any of the rest of us would do and -- and -- and open the blast shields and let us the hell out of here!

name: Rick
line: Why don't you make me, implausibly naive pubescent boy with an old Jewish comedy writer's name?

name: Mrs. Refrigerator
line: In your face!

name: Morty
line: Give me the gun.  I'm not doing this in front of Pencilvester. Bring him to the garage.  All right, you listen to me, you son of a bitch parasite scum. We could either do this the easy way or the hard way. You know, y-y-y-- do you want to live? Then open the blast shield doors.

name: Rick
line: Shut up, Morty, you brainwashed, little turd that might not even be real because I'm brainwashed, too.

name: Morty
line: You know, Rick, this isn't easy for us. You know, w-we all remember you as a friend.

name: Rick
line: Oh, oh, oh, really? Well, I remember you as a whiny, little piece of shit, Morty!

name: Morty
line: Oh -- oh, yeah?

name: Rick
line: Yeah! I've got about a thousand memories of your dumb little ass and about six of them are pleasant. The rest is annoying garbage. So why don't you do us both a favor and pull the trigger? Do it! Do it, motherfucker! Pull the fucking trigger!

name: Duck with Muscles
line: Oh, wow. Baby Wizard was a parasite? He set me up with my wife.

name: Rick
line: What the hell?

name: Morty
line: I figured it out, Rick! The parasites can only create pleasant memories. I know you're real because I have a ton of bad memories with you!

name: Rick
line: Holy crap, Morty, you're right.

name: Morty
line: Is -- is -- isn't that what you were trying to make me understand by yelling at me?

name: Rick
line: Well, yeah, duh-doy. T-took you long enough.

name: Rick
line: Now let's go, Morty. We got a lot of friends and family to exterminate.

name: Morty
line: Everybody remain calm! This isgonna take some explaining.

name: Rick
line: We need to kill everyone that we can only remember fondly. Who's got a bad memory about Mrs. Refrigerator?

name: Mrs Refrigerator
line: I-I-I-I -- everyone has bad memories of me. You remember that one time?  Ooh, man, we couldn't stop screaming.

name: Beth
line: Uh, roller coasters aren't bad, Mrs. Refrigerator. They're thrilling. And you've been a perfect companion to me my entire life.

name: Mrs Refrigerator
line: The jig is up!  get me out of here. Get me out of here! Aah!   Oh, shit!

name: Rick
line: Everybody back! If you're not a parasite, you have nothing to fear. What about Summer?

name: Summer
line: Why am I always your go-to?

name: Summer
line: Never go in my room again.

name: Morty
line: I didn't!

name: Morty
line: She's real. She's my bitch of a sister.

name: Summer
line: Nice.

name: Summer
line: Mom, are you driving me to --

name: Beth
line: Hmm? Yeah, yeah, yes. What time?

name: Summer
line: Oh, my god. Are you drunk?

name: Beth
line: What're you, my life coach?

name: Summer
line: Your what?

name: Summer
line: Oh! God! Oh. Oh, my gosh. Oh! God! Mom!

name: Beth
line: Sweetheart, are you okay? I didn't mean to --

name: Summer
line: I'm gonna have a bruise! It's picture day!

name: Beth
line: It's not, don't overreact. I can clean it up.

name: Summer
line: I want the police to take me!

name: Summer
line: Morty, give a gun to the lady that got pregnant with me too early and constantly makes it our problem.

name: Beth
line: Thank you, sweetie.

name: Cross Teddy Bear
line: Beth, Beth, please!

name: Beth
line: I thought it was too good to be true that we'd have compatible kidneys.

name: Rick
line: Come on, man. Haven't we ever had an uncomfortable silence or an awkward fart on a road trip? Come on, Pencilvester. Give me anything.

name: Pencilvester
line: Rick, I'm Pencilvester. Listen to that name. You can't kill me.

name: Rick
line: You're right.  Kill Pencilvester.

name: Tinkles
line: Summer, I've always loved you!

name: Summer
line: Yep.

name: Summer
line: Oh, my god!

name: Morty
line: I-I-I thought you went to a concert!

name: Summer
line: We forgot the tickets! Why in the kitchen?!

name: Morty
line: I do it everywhere! Stop shaming me!

name: Summer
line: You're not the victim here!

name: Morty
line: I hate you, and I was thinking about your friend Grace!

name: Summer
line: Aaaaaah!

name: Mr. Beauregard
line: Ah. Master Rick. Remember when you weren't going to shoot me?

name: Rick
line: I guess I did the butler! Ha ha! Does -- d-does that scan?

name: Ghost in a Jar
line: Oh, I-I get it. It's a play on "the butler did it."

name: Rick
line: Thanks, ghost in a jar. You always were good at pointing out potentially obscure comedy.

name: Jerry
line: You got to hide me, Sleepy Gary.

name: Sleepy Gary
line: Don't worry. I have a plan. If we can get to my boat, there's a --

name: Jerry
line: No. No! Send me to Gary. I want to be with Gary.

name: Beth
line: Whoa. What the hell?

name: Jerry
line: Look out for that homeless guy!

name: Beth
line: Open the door! Open the door! Open the door!

name: Jerry
line: There isn't time! Just run!

name: Beth
line: Get out here and help me!

name: Jerry
line: They say you shouldn't do that! Just run!

name: Beth
line: Ugh. Sorry, Jerry. You're real.

name: Jerry
line: I'm a parasite!

name: Beth
line: Yeah, but you're real.

name: Beth
line: Uh, uh, I need time to forget about Sleepy Gary.

name: Jerry
line: Me, too.

name: Rick
line: From now on, let's all be careful to wash our hands when we get back from outer space. That goes for everyone.

name: Jerry
line: This is depressing. We killed every good person in the house. We're what's left? What a family.

name: Rick
line: At least we're real, Jerry. We're real. Rikki tikki tavi!

name: Mr. Poopybutthole
line: Ooh, whee! Amen to that. Now, this little poopypants is hungry. Will somebody pass me a pork chop?

name: Mr. Poopybutthole
line: Huh. I-is -- is something wrong, Beth?

name: Rick
line: No, Beth!

name: Mr. Poopybutthole
line: Oh, fuck.

name: Beth
line: Wait, but I --

name: Mr. Poopybutthole
line: Oh, Beth! Why?!

name: Jerry
line: I need an ambulance! There's been a shooting. My wife shot... Uh, my -- my wife shot a long-time family friend.

name: Mr. Poopybutthole
line: Why?

name: Summer
line: Oh, my god, oh, my god, oh, my god, Mr. Poopybutthole.

name: Beth
line: I-I thought --

name: Morty
line: Keep breathing!

name: Mr. Poopybutthole
line: Oh, god. What's happening?

name: Morty
line: Look at me! Look at me! Don't -- don't fall asleep!

name: Mr. Poopybutthole
line: Is -- is this what bleeding to death is? Oh, whee. Is this how I die?

name: Rick
line: Oh, geez! Oh, my god!

name: Mr. Poopybutthole
line: Why would you do this? Beth. It's not supposed to hurt. I-I thought...  Ooh, whee.

name: Beth
line: Oh, he -- he's looking a lot better.

name: Rick
line: Listen, Beth, don't torture yourself. I made a similar mistake years ago, but, you know, on a planetary scale.

name: Beth
line: Is, um, is he mad at me?

name: Rick
line: He's not pressing charges. I mean, that's got to be the "you shot me" equivalent of not being mad.

name: Beth
line: Can he have visitors?

name: Doctor
line: He'd like to be alone. He told me to tell you he's sorry you didn't have bad memories of him? If you love him, you should leave.

name: Rick
line: And that's the wa-a-a-a-y the news goes.
